tailwindClasses.hero: min-h-screen flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-20

hero.description: Hero section with a headline, description, and a demo launch button. Includes an illustration of the product dashboard.
hero.tailwindClasses: min-h-screen flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-20

trusted_by.description: A row of logos of companies that trust Karumi.

lead_capture.description: Section highlighting the ability to close leads with hyper-personalized demos. Includes a world map illustration.
lead_capture.tailwindClasses: py-16 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 items-center

agent_capabilities.description: Section emphasizing the modern approach to demos.

product_demos.tailwindClasses: py-16 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 items-center

multilingual_agents.tailwindClasses: py-16 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 items-center

crm_integration.tailwindClasses: py-16 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 items-center

testimonials.description: Testimonials section with quotes and author information.

cta.description: Call to action section to accelerate growth with AI-led demos.

footer.description: Footer section with company information, legal links, and product links.

inspiration.overallVibe: Sophisticated and modern SaaS website with a clean design, elegant typography, and subtle gradients.
inspiration.designNotes: The design uses a consistent color palette, elegant typography, and clear calls to action. The use of illustrations and whitespace creates a professional and trustworthy feel.
